discussiontools-autotopicsubpopup-dismis: Label for a button that closes a popup
discussiontools-autotopicsubpopup-prefer: Label for a link to Special:Preferences
discussiontools-defaultsummary-reply:
Default edit summary for a reply.

'''Note that this is a noun (''a reply''), not a verb (''to reply''). Alternatively you can use a past tense verb if that's more natural in your language.'''
discussiontoolsdebug-intro: Message at the beginning of a special page
discussiontools-emptystate-button: Label for add new topic button on empty talk pages.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc: Description of the purpose of talk pages, shown on empty talk pages. {{PAGENAME}} is a page title. '''Do not translate these magic words in this message:''' * {{SUBJECTPAGENAME}} * {{PAGENAME}} * {{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-talkpages}} {{Related|Talk page introduction}}
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self:
Description shown to the user of the purpose of their own talk page if it's empty.

{{Related|Talk page introduction}}
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self-ano:
Description shown to the user of the purpose of their own talk page if it's empty and they're an IP user.
* $1 is a URL to register an account.
* $2 is a URL to log in.

{{Related|Talk page introduction}}
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self-tem:
Description shown to the user of the purpose of their own talk page if it's empty and they're using a temporary account.
* $1 is a URL to register an account.
* $2 is a URL to log in.

{{Related|Talk page introduction}}
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user: Description of the purpose of talk pages, shown on empty user talk pages. {{PAGENAME}} is a username. '''Do not translate these magic words in this message:''' * {{SUBJECTPAGENAME}} * {{PAGENAME}} * {{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}} {{Related|Talk page introduction}}
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user-ano: Description of the purpose of talk pages, shown on empty IP user talk pages. {{PAGENAME}} is a username. '''Do not translate these magic words in this message:''' * {{SUBJECTPAGENAME}} * {{PAGENAME}} * {{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}} {{Related|Talk page introduction}}
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user-tem: Description of the purpose of talk pages, shown on empty temporary account talk pages. {{PAGENAME}} is a username. '''Do not translate these magic words in this message:''' * {{SUBJECTPAGENAME}} * {{PAGENAME}} * {{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-temp}} * {{MediaWiki:tempuser-helppage}} {{Related|Talk page introduction}}
discussiontools-emptystate-link-talkpage:
{{notranslate}}
Link to page describing what talk pages are.

Used in:
* {{msg-mw|discussiontools-emptystate-desc}}.

Translate to a title where most wikis in the language you're translating to have one such help page; if they don't have one, you can use [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Help:Talk_pages]] as target.
discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage:
{{notranslate}}
Link to page describing what user pages are.

Used in:
* {{msg-mw|discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self}} and {{msg-mw|discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user}}.

Translate to a title where most wikis in the language you're translating to have one such help page; if they don't have one, you can use [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Help:User_page]] as target.

{{notranslate}}
Link to page describing what IP user pages are. By default it references {{msg-mw|discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}, don't change it unless you want it to point to a different page.

Used in:
* {{msg-mw|discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user-anon}}.

{{notranslate}}
Link to page describing what temporary account user pages are. By default it references {{msg-mw|discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}, don't change it unless you want it to point to a different page.

Used in:
* {{msg-mw|discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user-temp}}.
discussiontools-emptystate-title: Heading shown on empty talk pages. {{SUBJECTPAGENAME}} is a page title. '''Do not translate these magic words in this message:''' * {{SUBJECTPAGENAME}} {{Related|Talk page introduction}}
discussiontools-emptystate-title-self:
Heading shown on the user's own empty talk page

{{Related|Talk page introduction}}
discussiontools-emptystate-title-self-an:
Heading shown on the user's own empty talk page if they're an IP user

{{Related|Talk page introduction}}
discussiontools-emptystate-title-self-te:
Heading shown on the user's own empty talk page if they're using a temporary account

{{Related|Talk page introduction}}
discussiontools-emptystate-title-user: Heading shown on empty user talk pages. {{PAGENAME}} is a username. '''Do not translate these magic words in this message:''' * {{PAGENAME}} {{Related|Talk page introduction}}
discussiontools-emptystate-title-user-an:
Heading shown on empty IP user talk pages.

{{Related|Talk page introduction}}
discussiontools-emptystate-title-user-te:
Heading shown on empty temporary account talk pages.

{{Related|Talk page introduction}}
discussiontools-error-comment-disappeare: Prompt to reload the page, sometimes show after {{msg-mw|discussiontools-error-comment-disappeared}}
discussiontools-error-comment-is-transcl:
Error message. Parameter: $1 – text of the 'Edit'/'Edit source' tab

Copy <nowiki>{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}</nowiki> into your translation. It will be shown as {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replylink}}

Error message. Parameter: $1 – page name.

Copy <nowiki>{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}</nowiki> into your translation. It will be shown as {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replylink}}
discussiontools-error-lint:
Error message. Parameters:
* $1 – URL to documentation on mediawiki.org
* $2 – URL to talk page on mediawiki.org
* $3 – URL to the editor (action=edit)
discussiontools-error-noswitchtove-exten: Type of syntax detected, used as a parameter in {{msg-mw|discussiontools-error-noswitchtove}}.
discussiontools-error-noswitchtove-table: Type of syntax detected, used as a parameter in {{msg-mw|discussiontools-error-noswitchtove}}.
discussiontools-error-noswitchtove-templ: Type of syntax detected, used as a parameter in {{msg-mw|discussiontools-error-noswitchtove}}.
discussiontools-error-noswitchtove-title: Type of syntax detected, used as a parameter in {{msg-mw|discussiontools-error-noswitchtove}}.
discussiontools-findcomment-results-id:
Message shown after submitting the form on [[Special:FindComment]]. Followed by a bulleted list.

Parameters:
* $1 – number of results

'ID' and 'name' are technical terms, see https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:DiscussionTools/How_it_works#Assigning_ID_and_name
discussiontools-findcomment-results-name:
Message shown after submitting the form on [[Special:FindComment]]. Followed by a bulleted list.

Parameters:
* $1 – number of results

'ID' and 'name' are technical terms, see https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:DiscussionTools/How_it_works#Assigning_ID_and_name
discussiontools-findcomment-gotocomment:
Message shown after submitting the form on [[Special:FindComment]]. Follows {{msg-mw|discussiontools-findcomment-results-id}} or {{msg-mw|discussiontools-findcomment-results-name}} and a list of results.

Parameters:
* $1 – comment ID, can only be used in link target
discussiontools-findcomment-label-search:
Button label on [[Special:FindComment]]

'ID' and 'name' are technical terms, see [[mw:Extension:DiscussionTools/How it works#Assigning ID and name]].
discussiontools-findcomment-noresults: Message shown after submitting the form on [[Special:FindComment]].
discussiontools-findcomment-results-notc: Additional label for a result on [[Special:FindComment]], shown following a link to a page.
discussiontools-findcomment-results-tran: Additional label for a result on [[Special:FindComment]], shown following a link to a page.
discussiontools-findcomment-title: Page title for [[Special:FindComment]], also shown on the list on [[Special:SpecialPages]]
discussiontools-ledesection-button: Label for button to reveal content from the lede section (the section above the first heading).
discussiontools-ledesection-title: Title of dialog showing from the lede section (the section above the first heading).
discussiontools-limitreport-errorreqid: Label for the ID of the web request in which a DiscussionTools error has occurred.
discussiontools-limitreport-timeusage-va:
Follows {{msg-mw|discussiontools-limitreport-timeusage}}.

Parameters:
* $1 - the usage in seconds
{{Identical|Second}}
discussiontools-newtopic-missing-title:
Warning message shown when leaving the title field empty while adding a new topic to the page.

Copy <nowiki>{{int:discussiontools-replywidget-newtopic}}</nowiki> into your translation. It will be shown as {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-newtopic}}
discussiontools-newtopic-placeholder-tit:
Placeholder describing the heading field of a new topic
{{identical|Subject}}
discussiontools-newtopicssubscription-bu: Label for the button to subscribe to notifications about new topics on this page.
Tooltip for the button to subscribe to notifications about new topics on this page.
Label for the button to unsubscribe from notifications about new topics on this page.
Tooltip for the button to unsubscribe from notifications about new topics on this page.
discussiontools-newtopicssubscription-no: Body of notification shown when a user subscribes to notifications about new topics on this page.
Title of notification shown when a user subscribes to notifications about new topics on this page.
Body of notification shown when a user unsubscribes from notifications about new topics on this page.
Title of notification shown when a user unsubscribes from notifications about new topics on this page.
discussiontools-notification-added-topic:
Notification header for when a new topic has been started on a page.

* $2 - the username of the user who started the topic.
* $3 - discussion page title.
* $4 - topic title.

Notification header for when multiple new topics have been started on a page.

* $1 - number of new topics.
* $2 - discussion page title.
Notification compact header for when a new topic has been started on a page.
Label for button to view topic that was just posted.
discussiontools-notification-removed-top:
Notification body text for when multiple topics were removed from a page.

Follows {{msg-mw|discussiontools-notification-removed-topic-header}} or {{msg-mw|discussiontools-notification-removed-topic-header-bundled}}.

Parameters:
* $1 - the number of topics removed

Notification header text for when a topic was removed from a page. Parameters:
* $1 - the formatted username of the user who replied to the topic (unused)
* $2 - the username for gender purposes (unused)
* $3 - title of the page
* $4 - title of the topic

Notification header text for when multiple topics were removed from a page. Parameters:
* $1 - the number of topics removed
* $2 - title of the page

Notification compact header text for when a topic was removed from a page. Parameters:
* $1 - the formatted username of the user who replied to the topic (unused)
* $2 - the username for gender purposes (unused)
* $3 - title of the page (unused)
* $4 - title of the topic
Label for button to view a the page previously containing the removed topic.
Button to disable notifications of the given type, shown below an Echo notification.
Title of notification popup shown when a user disables this type of Echo notifications.
Body of notification popup shown when a user disables this type of Echo notifications.
discussiontools-notification-subscribed-:
Notification header text for when there is a reply on a topic. Parameters:
* $1 - the formatted username of the user who replied to the topic
* $2 - the username for gender purposes
* $3 - title of the page
* $4 - title of the topic.

Notification header text for when there is a multiple replies on a topic. Parameters:
* $1 - the number of replies for display
* $2 - the raw number of replies, for PLURAL
* $3 - title of the topic.
{{Related|discussiontools-notification-bundle}}
Label for button to view a comment that was just posted.
discussiontools-pageframe-latestcomment:
Label showing when the most recent comment was posted on a page. Parameters:
* $1 – When the comment was posted, e.g. '1 hour ago'. This text is a link to the comment.
* $2 – The user who posted the comment. This is not a link, and can be used for GENDER: markup.
* $3 – The title of the topic they posted in. This text is a link to the topic.

See also: {{mw-msg|discussiontools-pageframe-latestcomment-notopic}}
discussiontools-pageframe-latestcomment-:
Label showing when the most recent comment was posted on a page, but in a section with no topic heading. Parameters:
* $1 – When the comment was posted, e.g. '1 hour ago'. This text is a link to the comment.
* $2 – The user who posted the comment. This is not a link, and can be used for GENDER: markup.

See also: {{mw-msg|discussiontools-pageframe-latestcomment}}
discussiontools-permalink-comment-copied: Notification text shown when a link to a specific comment has been successfully copied to the clipboard.
discussiontools-preference-autotopicsub-:
Used in [[Special:Preferences]].

Used as help text for the checkbox {{msg-mw|discussiontools-preference-autotopicsub}}
discussiontools-preference-description:
Used in [[Special:Preferences]].

Used as description for the checkbox to enable discussion tools as a Beta Feature.

The label for this checkbox is {{msg-mw|discussiontools-preference-label}}.
discussiontools-preference-discussion-li: {{optional|Used on [[Special:Preferences]] as a link to a page where users can discuss this Beta Feature. Defaults to a page on MediaWiki.org.}}
discussiontools-preference-gadget-confli: Additional label shown instead of {{msg-mw|discussiontools-preference-replytool}} when it can't be enabled due to a conflict with a gadget.
discussiontools-preference-info-link: {{optional|Used on [[Special:Preferences]] as a link to a page where users can learn about this Beta Feature. Defaults to a page on MediaWiki.org.}}
discussiontools-preference-newtopictool:
Used in [[Special:Preferences]] in the section titled {{msg-mw|prefs-discussion}}, in the same list with:
* {{msg-mw|Discussiontools-preference-replytool}}.

Used as label for checkbox to enable the new topic tool.

The help text for this checkbox is: {{msg-mw|discussiontools-preference-newtopictool-help}}
discussiontools-preference-newtopictool-: Used in [[Special:Preferences]] as an option label, following {{msg-mw|discussiontools-preference-newtopictool-createpage}}
Used in [[Special:Preferences]] as an option label, following {{msg-mw|discussiontools-preference-newtopictool-createpage}}

Used in [[Special:Preferences]].

Used as help text for the checkbox {{msg-mw|discussiontools-preference-newtopictool}}
discussiontools-preference-replytool:
Used in [[Special:Preferences]] in the section titled {{msg-mw|prefs-discussion}}, in the same list with:
* {{msg-mw|Discussiontools-preference-newtopictool}}.

Used as label for checkbox to enable the reply tool.

The help text for this checkbox is: {{msg-mw|discussiontools-preference-replytool-help}}
discussiontools-preference-replytool-hel:
Used in [[Special:Preferences]].

Used as help text for the checkbox {{msg-mw|discussiontools-preference-replytool}}
discussiontools-preference-sourcemodetoo:
Used in [[Special:Preferences]].

Used as help text for the checkbox {{msg-mw|discussiontools-preference-sourcemodetoolbar}}
discussiontools-preference-summary: Used in [[Special:Preferences]] in the section titled {{msg-mw|prefs-discussion}}, at the top as a summary for the whole section.
discussiontools-preference-topicsubscrip:
Used in [[Special:Preferences]].

Used as help text for the checkbox {{msg-mw|discussiontools-preference-topicsubscription}}
discussiontools-preference-visualenhance:
Used in [[Special:Preferences]].

Used as help text for the checkbox {{msg-mw|discussiontools-preference-visualenhancements}}
discussiontools-replybutton: Label for the reply button added after each comment.
discussiontools-replywidget-abandon:
Message shown when abandoning a comment

Similar to {{msg-mw|mw-widgets-abandonedit}}, {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic}}.
discussiontools-replywidget-abandon-disc:
Label for button to abandon a comment

This button follows {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandon}}.

Similar to {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic-discard}}.
discussiontools-replywidget-abandon-keep:
Label for button to cancel abandoning a comment

This button follows {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandon}}.

Similar to {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic-keep}}.
discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic:
Message shown when abandoning a new topic

Similar to {{msg-mw|mw-widgets-abandonedit}}, {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandon}}.

Label for button to abandon a new topic

This button follows {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic}}.

Similar to {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandon-discard}}.

Label for button to cancel abandoning a new topic

This button follows {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic}}.

Similar to {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-abandon-keep}}.
discussiontools-replywidget-advanced: Label for button to toggle the advanced options, which shows an edit summary input and watchlist checkbox.
discussiontools-replywidget-anon-warning:
Warning message to be displayed when anonymous user starts writing a new topic or reply.
* $1 is a URL to log in.
* $2 is a URL to register an account.
discussiontools-replywidget-autocreate-w:
Warning message to be displayed when anonymous user starts writing a new topic or reply, and temporary user auto-creation is enabled.
* $1 is a URL to log in.
* $2 is a URL to register an account.
* $3 is a link to the documentation page for temporary accounts.
discussiontools-replywidget-cancel:
Label for the cancel button to exit out of the widget

{{Identical|Cancel}}
discussiontools-replywidget-feedback: Label for link to share feedback about the reply widget
discussiontools-replywidget-feedback-lin: {{optional|Link to a page where users can share feedback about the reply widget. Defaults to a page on MediaWiki.org.}}

{{notranslate}}
Link to a page where users can share feedback about the new topic widget. Defaults to a page on MediaWiki.org.
discussiontools-replywidget-keyboard-sho:
Message shown when the user tried to submit a comment using the Enter key, advising them to use Ctrl+Enter/Cmd+Enter (depending on the platform) instead.

Parameters:
* $1 - either Ctrl+Enter or Cmd+Enter
discussiontools-replywidget-loading: Message shown while the reply widget is loading
discussiontools-replywidget-mention-pref: {{optional|Character to prefix mentions. This does not have to be the same as the trigger character, which is always '@'.}}
discussiontools-replywidget-mention-suff: {{optional|Character to suffix mentions. This is intended for community customization in languages with honorifics.}}
discussiontools-replywidget-mention-tool: Header of search results when searching for a user to mention. Parameters: * $1 – search query for the username. Note that this is not a full username, and '''can't''' be used with {{GENDER:}}.
Title text for the user mention tool.
discussiontools-replywidget-mode-source:
Label for the widget's source mode.

This should not include the word 'edit' or 'editor', and where possible should avoid 'wikitext' which is MediaWiki-specific terminology.
discussiontools-replywidget-mode-visual:
Label for the widget's visual mode.

This should not include the word 'edit' or 'editor', and should not use the product name VisualEditor.
discussiontools-replywidget-newcomments-: Button shown when new comments have been posted in the section the user is drafting a reply in.
discussiontools-replywidget-newtopic: Label for button to post a new topic
discussiontools-replywidget-newtopic-lin:
{{notranslate}}
Used by {{msg-mw|Tag-discussiontools-newtopic}} as a link to a page where users learn about the feature. Defaults to a page on MediaWiki.org.
discussiontools-replywidget-placeholder-:
Placeholder describing who is being replied to.

Parameters:
* $1 – username of the person who wrote the previous comment
discussiontools-replywidget-preferences:
Label for link to the relevant preferences in the reply widget (the link points to [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-editing-discussion]]).
{{Identical|Preferences}}
discussiontools-replywidget-preview: Label for the preview area of the reply widget
discussiontools-replywidget-reply: Label for the button to submit a reply in the reply widget
discussiontools-replywidget-reply-link:
{{notranslate}}
Used by {{msg-mw|Tag-discussiontools-reply}} as a link to a page where users learn about the feature. Defaults to a page on MediaWiki.org.
discussiontools-replywidget-return-to-ne: Label for the button to scroll the new topic widget back into view.
discussiontools-replywidget-return-to-re: Label for the button to scroll the reply widget back into view.
discussiontools-replywidget-signature-bo: Body of the warning about typing in your signature. Parameters: * $1 – the signature markup, i.e. ~~~~ * $2 – localised keyboard shortcut to undo, for example Ctrl+Z
discussiontools-replywidget-signature-ti: Title of the warning about typing in your signature
discussiontools-replywidget-summary:
Label for the summary field that describes your comment. This will be stored as an edit summary, but in the context of the reply tool we don't want to refer to 'edits'
{{identical|Summary}}
discussiontools-replywidget-terms-click:
Terms of use for posting a reply.

* $1 is the label of the button to be clicked, e.g. {{msg-mw|discussiontools-replywidget-reply}}.
discussiontools-replywidget-transcluded: Message explaining that the comment will be saved on a different page than the one you're viewing right now (because it was transcluded from it). Parameter: $1 – page name
discussiontools-replywidget-watchthis:
Label for a checkbox in the reply widget. It is used instead of the usual {{msg-mw|watchthis}} to distinguish the watchlist functionality from [[mw:Talk_pages_project/Feature_summary#Topic_subscriptions|topic subscriptions]].
{{Identical|Add this page to your watchlist}}
discussiontools-target-comment-missing:
Message shown in a popup when the user follows a link that would highlight a '''single''' comment on a talk page, e.g. [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/User_talk:Example#c-Example1-20190626080000], but the comment doesn't exist on the page any more. Such links are used in notifications, or can be used in comments by other users.

See also for multiple comments: {{msg-mw|discussiontools-target-comments-missing}}
discussiontools-target-comments-missing:
Message shown in a popup when the user follows a link that would highlight potentially '''multiple new''' comments on a talk page, but the exact number is unknown, e.g. [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=User_talk:Example&dtnewcommentssince=c-Example1-2019-06-26T10:20:00.000Z-Example2-2019-06-26T10:10:00.000Z], but none of these comments exist on the page any more. Such links are generated by notifications.

See also for a single comments: {{msg-mw|discussiontools-target-comment-missing}}
discussiontools-topicheader-authorcount: Label showing how many users have commented in a discussion.
discussiontools-topicheader-commentcount: Label showing how many comments have been posted in a discussion. for languages without plural counters, just apply <nowiki> {{PLURAL:$1|[''comment''_in_your_language]}}</nowiki>, but never delete the template or it triggers error alert.
discussiontools-topicheader-latestcommen:
Label showing when the most recent comment was posted in a discussion. Parameters:
* $1 – When the comment was posted, e.g. '1 hour ago'. This text is a link to the comment.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-action:
Shown as page title when subscribing to or unsubscribing from a topic on a page. Parameters:
* $1 - title of the page
* $2 - title of the topic

Button to subscribe to a topic.
{{identical|Subscribe}}
Prompt shown when about to subscribe to a topic on an action page.
Prompt shown when about to subscribe to notifications about new topics on an action page.

Button to unsubscribe from a topic.
{{identical|Unsubscribe}}
Prompt shown when about to unsubscribe from a topic on an action page.
Prompt shown when about to unsubscribe from notifications about new topics on an action page.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-button:
Label for the subscribe button added to each section. Use title case like normal buttons.
{{identical|Subscribe}}
Tooltip for the subscribe link added to each section.
Label for the unsubscribe link added to each section. Use title case like normal buttons.
Tooltip for the unsubscribe link added to each section.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-error-: Body of error page shown when subscription not found.
Title of error page shown when subscription not found.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-notify: Body of notification shown when a user subscribes to a topic.
Title of notification shown when a user subscribes to a topic.
Body of notification shown when a user unsubscribes from a topic.
Title of notification shown when a user unsubscribes from a topic.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-pager-:
Used on [[mw:Special:TopicSubscriptions|Special:TopicSubscriptions]] as a table heading.
{{identical|Action}}

Date of first subscription.

Used on [[mw:Special:TopicSubscriptions|Special:TopicSubscriptions]] as a table heading.
Label for a subscription to new topics on a page.

Date of latest notification.

Used on [[mw:Special:TopicSubscriptions|Special:TopicSubscriptions]] as a table heading.

Used on [[mw:Special:TopicSubscriptions|Special:TopicSubscriptions]] in the table. It means that a notification about a topic was never sent.
{{identical|Never}}
Used on [[mw:Special:TopicSubscriptions|Special:TopicSubscriptions]] as a table heading.
Used on [[mw:Special:TopicSubscriptions|Special:TopicSubscriptions]] as a table heading.
Used on [[mw:Special:TopicSubscriptions|Special:TopicSubscriptions]] in the table, as a button label.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-prefer: Used on [[Special:Preferences]] as a label of a link to [[mw:Special:TopicSubscriptions|Special:TopicSubscriptions]].
discussiontools-topicsubscription-specia: Used on [[mw:Special:TopicSubscriptions|Special:TopicSubscriptions]] as the page title.
minerva-talk-full-page: Used as label for link to show the full talk page.
tag-discussiontools-source-enhanced-desc:
Long description of the discussiontools-source-enhanced tag.

Shown on [[Special:Tags]].
